code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import Dropzone from'react-dropzone';import{updateCSS,updateHTML,updateJS}from'../reducers/codeReducer';import'../css/ImportContainer.css';var ImportContainer=function ImportContainer(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleImport=function handleImport(file){var reader=new FileReader();reader.readAsText(file,"UTF-8");reader.onload=function(evt){switch(file.type){case"text/css":dispatch(updateCSS(evt.target.result));break;case"text/html":dispatch(updateHTML(evt.target.result));break;case"text/javascript":dispatch(updateJS(evt.target.result));break;default:alert("File Type Not Supported");};reader.onerror=function(evt){alert("File not loaded!");};};};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"import-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Dropzone,{onDrop:function onDrop(acceptedFile){return handleImport(acceptedFile[0]);}},function(_ref){var getRootProps=_ref.getRootProps,getInputProps=_ref.getInputProps;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",Object.assign({className:"dropzone"},getRootProps()),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",getInputProps()),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",null,"Drag 'n' drop files here, or click to Browse"));}));};export default ImportContainer;
